extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade DataMosaix Private Cloud Software
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the DataMosaix Private Cloud software from V7.07 to V7.09 with the assistance of the application support team.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Control System Networks Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use more secure methods, such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs). Ensure VPNs are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets. Refer to CISA's ICS webpage for guidance.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Clicking Unsolicited Links or Attachments
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to CISA's guidance on recognizing and avoiding email scams.

extracted_playbook.title: Educate on Social Engineering and Phishing Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Educate users on avoiding social engineering and phishing attacks. Refer to CISA's resources for more information.
